x-kubernetes-validations.message: minCount should be positive and less or equal to count
priority should not be nil when priorityClassName is set

additionalProperties.description: ResourceFlavorReference is the name of the ResourceFlavor.

x-kubernetes-validations.message: operator must be Exists when 'key' is empty, which means 'match all values and all keys'
effect must be 'NoExecute' when 'tolerationSeconds' is set
a value must be empty when 'operator' is 'Exists'
clusterName and nominatedClusterNames are mutually exclusive

x-kubernetes-validations.rule: has(self.status) && has(self.status.conditions) && self.status.conditions.exists(c, c.type == 'QuotaReserved' && c.status == 'True') && has(self.status.admission) ? size(self.spec.podSets) == size(self.status.admission.podSetAssignments) : true
x-kubernetes-validations.message: podSetAssignments must have the same number of podSets as the spec

x-kubernetes-validations.rule: (has(oldSelf.status) && has(oldSelf.status.conditions) && oldSelf.status.conditions.exists(c, c.type == 'QuotaReserved' && c.status == 'True')) ? (oldSelf.spec.priorityClassSource == self.spec.priorityClassSource) : true

(has(oldSelf.status) && has(oldSelf.status.conditions) && oldSelf.status.conditions.exists(c, c.type == 'QuotaReserved' && c.status == 'True') && has(oldSelf.spec.priorityClassName) && has(self.spec.priorityClassName)) ? (oldSelf.spec.priorityClassName == self.spec.priorityClassName) : true

(has(oldSelf.status) && has(oldSelf.status.conditions) && oldSelf.status.conditions.exists(c, c.type == 'QuotaReserved' && c.status == 'True')) && (has(self.status) && has(self.status.conditions) && self.status.conditions.exists(c, c.type == 'QuotaReserved' && c.status == 'True')) && has(oldSelf.spec.queueName) && has(self.spec.queueName) ? oldSelf.spec.queueName == self.spec.queueName : true

((has(oldSelf.status) && has(oldSelf.status.conditions) && oldSelf.status.conditions.exists(c, c.type == 'Admitted' && c.status == 'True')) && (has(self.status) && has(self.status.conditions) && self.status.conditions.exists(c, c.type == 'Admitted' && c.status == 'True')))?((has(oldSelf.spec.maximumExecutionTimeSeconds)?oldSelf.spec.maximumExecutionTimeSeconds:0) ==  (has(self.spec.maximumExecutionTimeSeconds)?self.spec.maximumExecutionTimeSeconds:0)):true
